member.name: T:Enemies.Zombie
member.summary: Represents a single zombie enemy with optional initial health and name.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Zombie class with default health (0) and name "(No name)".

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Zombie class with the specified initial health and name.
member.param: The initial health to assign (must be non-negative).
The initial name to assign (optional, defaults to "(No name)").
member.exception: Thrown if health is less than 0.

member.name: P:Enemies.Zombie.Health
member.summary: Gets or sets the zombie's current health.

member.name: P:Enemies.Zombie.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the zombie's name.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.TakeDamage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reduces the zombie's health by the specified amount, ensuring the health stays non-negative.
member.param: The amount of damage to inflict (must be non-negative).

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.ToString
member.summary: Provides a string representation of the zombie, including name and health.
member.returns: A formatted string describing the zombie.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main method demonstrates creating and interacting with Zombie objects.
